description: These fluffy vegan quinoa pancakes are made with rich coconut milk and hearty quinoa that's blended into the batter.
name: Coconut Milk Quinoa Pancakes
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 whole wheat pastry flour (or sub all purpose)

recipeInstructions.text: Stir flour, quinoa, sugar, baking powder and salt together in medium bowl.
Add water, coconut milk and vanilla. Stir just until blended.
Spray or coat griddle or skillet with cooking spray and place over medium heat.
Drop 1/4 cupfuls of batter at a time and cook until fluffy and golden brown on each side, about 5 minutes.
Top with shredded coconut and maple syrup.
